title: karuNai mati tavazhum
sahitya:
karuNai mati tavazhum jaganmOhini ambA enakku aruL tuNai ena varam Anandabhairavi


anupallavi

  suruti vaDivAna sunAdavinOdini shuddha jnAnam tarum kIrvAni tAyE


caraNam    kavitai maNam kamazhum kalyANi vINAgAnam isaittiDum dEva nAyaki
kavignanin nenjinil amarndiDum ranjani kAviya shOlai mIdu dEvagAndhAri
